subject: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
International Monetary Fund 700 19th Street, N.W.. Washington, D.C. 20431 ;
Fax Operator: (202) 623-4661. Map of IMF

Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.

I am Ms. Kristalina Georgieva is Managing Director of the International
Monetary Fund.And Chairman of the Executive Board from October 1, 2019,

I wish to inform you that the USA Monetary Agency have earlier re-called
your Fund totally sum of ($2.5billion U.S dollars from Credit Suisse
Zurich, Switzerland and this Fund contains the exact amount which you have
been pursuing for long period of time if not getting to years, while the
re-calling of this Fund was due to Lack of Your Fund Documentation.

After series of Complain tabled to this Government about the high rate of
Scamming issue been carried out and mostly from Africans, while the most
painful issue is that we finally discovered that this Internet Hackers have
gone to the extend of telling you about the reality and existence of your
Fund and you easily fall to their victim, while in respect to the
termination of all these Scamming issues, We have
alerted your Government Embassy to quickly come and fight for your rescue
by settling the FEE for the issuance of Your Fund Documentation since that
was the main reason your real Fund has been seized and delayed.

We hereby today announce a congratulating news to you as your Government
Embassy have finally responded directly to our call and
therefore have paid accordingly for your Fund Documentation, thereby giving
you all assurance that you now have the necessary Documentation that
qualified you to respond and claim your real Fund under my care
and stop all other Communication if not from this Office.

Now that your fund have been documented, the Central Bank of USA (CBA)
Governor have agreed with Monetary Agency`s director of operation to
release your ($2.5billion)US dollars ASAP.

Your Fund approximate total sum of ($2.5billion)US dollars which have been
earlier assigned under a check is presently still in a check form worth
($2.5billion) US dollars and the USA Monetary Agency have today instructed
to delivery the check to your home address without any further delay,

After that you have to make a choice on how to receive your Fund which is
to be Through check or Bank to Bank Wire Transfer

Note; The only fee you have to pay is $200.00USD only to obtain your fund
release order certificate from supreme court, This will duly guarantee and
cover your money as being legitimately acquired from the U.S Government,

I am here giving your guarantee and also 100 % percent assurance that this
is the only money you have to pay and after that you will receive your fund
immediately. Please any delay from your side will be a very dangerous,,

Also do reconfirm the bellow information's to us.

Your Full Name.
Your Country,
State
City.
Your Available Cell Number.
Your ID or PASPORT
YOUR BANK DETAILS,

Be advised to move ahead and buy $200.
Steam wallet card or Sephora card scratch it and attached the picture to us.

Bear it in mind that after three days from today if you failed to comply by
sending this fee your fund will be divert into USA government account that
is finally,


God bless you more together with your family,

Congratulations
Yours in Service,
Sincerely,
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva

subject: Re: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund, I must admit I wasn't aware of it until now. 

I'm glad to hear that my government embassy has been involved and has paid for the fund. That's very reassuring! 

You mentioned that the only fee I have to pay is to obtain my fund release order from the supreme court. Could you please explain more about this process? How much is the fee and how do I go about paying it?

Also, you mentioned two options for receiving the fund - through check or Bank to Bank Wire Transfer. Could you provide more details on these options? Which one would be faster and more secure?

Lastly, you asked me to buy a Steam wallet card or Sephora card and attach a picture of it. Could you clarify why this is necessary? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
ATM VISA CARD US Department,

Attn: Beneficiary.

My Name is Mr. Hudson Grayson, Chairman US Department, First I must
apologize for contacting you if you think my help is not needed. My problem
is that I hate to see people being cheated for no reason.

We are arrested presented two lady's name  by Ms.Hannah James & Ms.Addison
Alexander  who came to our office to claim your fund  (us$55. 5 Million
United State Dollars) According to this two lady's said that you have heart
attack problem last week Friday, March 8, 2024 and you are in the hospital
which you can't make it again to receive  your fund that is why you gave
them authority to claim,

Now this issue is very seriously and according to our government United
State said that if you are not capable to receive your fund them will
release this two lady's and hand them over your fund by USA authority,

Thereby giving you all assurance that you now have the necessary
Documentation that qualified you to respond and claim your real Fund under
my care as i am in this sit right now.

Note; the only fee required you to pay is $175 to obtain the Anti-Money
Laundering Certificate from IMF United State of America,Before your fund
will be release into your bank account directly or you receive it inform of
ATM VISA CARD,

You can buy $175 American express card or I Tune Gift Card scratch it and
attached the picture to us here. I hope everything is well understood.

I am giving you 100 % guarantee that your fund will be release to you if
you follow our instruction and authority to enjoying your benefits,

Bear it in mind that you have a limit time from now until 3 days to make
this payment otherwise your fund will be release to this two lady's,

Please reconfirm the bellow information's to us immediately to make your
choice.

Your Full Name.
Your Country,
State
City.
Home address
your Age
Your Available Cell Number.
Your ID
your bank details,

Reply back to us accordingly; we wait for your expedite response with the
payment. stay safe and stay blessing, our almighty God bless & protecting
you in Jesus name Amen,

Treat with urgency,

God bless you more together with your family,

Congratulations
Yours in Service,
Sincerely,
Mr. Hudson Grayson
Chairman US Department,

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. Hudson Grayson,

Thank you for reaching out to me and I hope this message finds you well. It's quite surprising to hear about the two ladies claiming my fund, especially since I haven't been in a hospital recently. I'm curious, how did they manage to convince you that they were acting on my behalf?

Also, could you please explain more about the Anti-Laundering Certificate from IMF United States? How does it work and why is it necessary for me to obtain one? 

I'm sorry but I can't provide the information you asked for at this moment. However, I'd love to continue our conversation and learn more about this situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
